tests.name: getCurrentPosition
tests.notes: should return current ad position x,y relative to getMaxSize Dimensions

tests.name: getDefaultPosition
tests.notes: should return default ad position x,y relative to getMaxSize Dimensions

tests.name: getMaxSize
tests.notes: will return available screen size in pixels minus tool/status bars

tests.name: getPlacementType
tests.notes: return placement type: inline

tests.name: getScreenSize
tests.notes: return total screen size in pixels

tests.name: open
tests.notes: Open url to IAD site

tests.name: playVideo
tests.notes: Play IAB video

tests.name: resize - Allow Offscreen
tests.notes: when set to true will allow the ad to resize offscreen, when false ad should resize centered

tests.name: resize - Custom Close Positions
tests.notes: should resize with custom close in indicated area

tests.name: resize - Simple
tests.notes: resize ad as shown in icons with partial screen dimensions

tests.name: setExpandProperties- All Params
tests.notes: should set the following properties: width:288,height:292,useCustomClose:true,isModal:true\nNote: isModal is read only

tests.name: setExpandProperties- String Vs. Boolean
tests.notes: set the following properties: width:288,height:292,useCustomClose:'true'\nNote: In our SDK, should translate string 'true' to boolean true.

tests.name: setExpandProperties- String Vs. Integer
tests.notes: should set the following properties: width:'288',height:'292',useCustomClose:true\nNote: In our SDK, should fail to change because values are not numbers

tests.name: setExpandProperties- Width
tests.notes: should set expand width to 288px

tests.name: setExpandProperties- Width Height
tests.notes: should set expand height / width to width:288/height:292

tests.name: setExpandProperties- Width Height UCC
tests.notes: should set values width:288,height:292,useCustomClose:true

tests.name: setOrientationProperties - Allow Orientation Change
tests.notes: should set values: allowOrientationChange:false

tests.name: setOrientationProperties - All Params
tests.notes: should set values: allowOrientationChange:false,forceOrientation:'portrait'

tests.name: setOrientationProperties - Bad Params
tests.notes: param "pineapple" should not be accepted

tests.name: setOrientationProperties - Force Orientation
tests.notes: should set value: forceOrientation:'landscape'

tests.name: setOrientationProperties - String Vs. Boolean
tests.notes: attempt set values: allowOrientationChange:'false',forceOrientation:'portrait'\nNote: should either fail to set or translate string value into boolean

tests.name: setResizeProperties - All Params
tests.notes: should set values: width:295,height:290,offsetX:7,offsetY:8,customClosePosition:'top-left',allowOffscreen:false

tests.name: setResizeProperties - Bad Allow Offscreen
tests.notes: attempt to set values: width:295,height:290,offsetX:7,offsetY:8,customClosePosition:'top-left',allowOffscreen:'pineapple'\nNote: should not accept bad param "pineapple"

tests.name: setResizeProperties - Bad CCP Value
tests.notes: attempt to set values: width:295,height:290,offsetX:7,offsetY:8,customClosePosition:'pineapple',allowOffscreen:'false'\nNote: should not accept bad param "pineapple"

tests.name: setResizeProperties - Omit Some Required
tests.notes: attempt to set values: width:295,offsetY:8\nNote incomplete values, should not set

tests.name: setResizeProperties - Required Only
tests.notes: should set values: width:295,height:290,offsetX:7,offsetY:8,customClosePosition:'top-right',allowOffscreen:'true'

tests.name: setResizeProperties - String Vs. Boolean
tests.notes: attempt to set values: width:295,height:290,offsetX:7,offsetY:8,customClosePosition:'top-left',allowOffscreen:'false'\nNote: Our SDK refuses the change to allowOffscreen because of the string 'false'

tests.name: setResizeProperties - String Vs. Integer
tests.notes: attempt to set values: width:'295',height:'290',offsetX:'7',offsetY:'8',customClosePosition:'top-left',allowOffscreen:false\nShould fail to set or translate string values to int.

tests.name: setResizeProperties - Too Big / Too Small
tests.notes: attempt to set values too big or too small for device screen size. Should fail to set values.

tests.name: expand - Expand Again
tests.notes: Both Expand Again Buttons Should do nothing.

tests.name: expand - Get Tests
tests.notes: Should expand, then buttons will get current expand properties.

tests.name: expand - Orientation Properties
tests.notes: Should expand, buttons will return current orientation properties.

tests.name: expand - Set Before Expand
tests.notes: Should expand to full screen size.

tests.name: expand - Simple
tests.notes: should expand add to fullscreen

tests.name: expand - Two Part
tests.notes: expand ad to IAB url

tests.name: expand - Two Part Bad URL
tests.notes: Should expand the the current view due to bad url, will have custom close area in upper right corner.

tests.name: addEventListener - Multiple Events
tests.notes: event ads/removes multiple events fires on error of bad setResizeProperties({})

tests.name: addEventListener
tests.notes: event ads/removes multiple events fires on error of bad setResizeProperties({})

tests.name: Bad Methods
tests.notes: These buttons should all result in nothing

tests.name: getTests
tests.notes: Get tests in interstitial

tests.name: Supports
tests.notes: Tests for Call, Text, Calendar, Picture, and Inline Video
